div.p:
(AUDIENCE CHANTING STEPHEN)
DOWN HERE, UP THERE, UP THERE,

(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)
WELCOME TO "THE LATE SHOW."
I AM YOUR HOST, STEPHEN COLBERT.

SHOCKING NEWS TONIGHT
GOING TO GET THE BIG CELEBRITY

FEUD EVERYONE IS TALKING ABOUT:
DONALD TRUMP VERSUS THE POPE.

AND AS AMERICA'S FOREMOST
CATHOLIC, LET ME EXPLAIN WHAT

THE POPE IS IN MEXICO RIGHT NOW,
WHERE HE WAS ASKED ABOUT DONALD

TRUMP'S PLAN TO BUILD A BORDER
WALL.

AND HIS HOLINESS SAID, QUOTE:
"A PERSON WHO THINKS ONLY ABOUT

BUILDING WALLS WHEREVER THEY MAY
BE AND NOT OF BUILDING BRIDGES

THIS MAN IS NOT CHRISTIAN IF HE
HAS SAID THINGS LIKE THAT."

(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)
THEN TRUMP'S OKAY BECAUSE HE
HAS NOT SAID THINGS LIKE THAT.

BECAUSE TRUMP WANTS TO BUILD A
WALL AROUND THIS COUNTRY.

I WONDER WHERE HE COULD HAVE
GOTTEN A CRAZY IDEA LIKE THAT.

>> SO THE MEXICAN GOVERNMENT FED
THE POPE A TREMENDOUS AMOUNT OF

STUFF ABOUT "TRUMP IS NOT A GOOD
PERSON."

AND THE POPE JUST-- CAN YOU
IMAGINE?

I JUST GOT A CALL, AS I'M
WALKING UP HERE.

THEY SAID, "MR. TRUMP, THE POPE
MADE A STATEMENT ABOUT YOU."

WHAT DID THE POPE SAY?"
I LIKE THE POPE.
I MEAN, WAS IT GOOD OR BAD?

BECAUSE IF IT'S GOOD, I LIKE THE
POPE.

IF IT'S BAD, I DON'T LIKE THE
POPE.

>> STEPHEN: YOU'VE GOT TO
RESPECT HIS HONESTY.

IT IS LIKE JESUS SAID, "BLESSED
ARE THE POOR, UNLESS THEY SAID

SOMETHING BAD ABOUT ME, THEN
SCREW 'EM."
I WANT TO TRY TO BROKER A PEACE.

MR. TRUMP, MR. POPE, IS IT
POSSIBLE THAT YOU GUYS ARE

FIGHTING BECAUSE YOU HAVE SO
MUCH IN COMMON?

AFTER ALL, YOU BOTH THINK YOU'RE
INFALLIBLE.

YOU BOTH SIT ON GOLDEN THRONES
AND YOU BOTH WEAR VERY SILLY

OF COURSE, TRUMP HAD TO HAVE THE
LAST WORD.

>> SO I WROTE THIS OUT VERY
QUICKLY ABOUT THE POPE.
DO YOU WANT TO HEAR IT?

BECAUSE WE HAVE GOT A GREAT SHOW
FOR YOU TONIGHT.

(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)
FIRST, I'LL BE TALKING TO THE

THEN I'LL SIT DOWN WITH THE
LOVELY AMANDA PEET.

(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)
THEN I'LL BE TALKING TO MY OLD

THAT BAND OVER THERE IS JON
BATISTE AND THE STAY HUMAN

THEY ARE ABOUT TO KICK THIS OFF,
BUT BEFORE THEY DO, ONE MORE

THING: A NEW STUDY FOUND THAT
SAYING YOU HAVE MINORITY FRIENDS

WILL MAKE YOU APPEAR LESS
RACIST.

AT LEAST THAT IS WHAT MY BUDDY
JOSE SAID.

AND NOW IT'S TIME FOR "THE LATE
SHOW" WITH STEPHEN COLBERT!

(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)
THANK YOU SO MUCH!

WELL, I'M SO GLAD YOU GUYS ARE
HERE.

THERE IS NOTHING MORE IMPORTANT
TO ME THAN BEING HONEST WITH MY

I LEARNED MY LESSON THE NIGHT I
TRIED TO PASS OFF A MOP WITH

THOUGH IT WORKED OUT FOR THE MOP
-- I HEAR HE IS DATING KATE

SO I WANT TO BE UP FRONT WITH
YOU AND ADMIT THAT,

OCCASIONALLY, WE GET PAID TO
FEATURE A SPONSOR'S PRODUCT ON

BUT I HAVE THE SAME HIGH
STANDARDS FOR PRODUCT PLACEMENT

AS I DO FOR APPEARING NUDE ON
CAMERA -- IT HAS TO BE INTEGRAL

TO THE PLOT, OR I HAVE NO
CHOICE.

AND TONIGHT ONE OF THOSE THINGS
IS TRUE.

BUT I THINK WE HAVE MANAGED TO
MAKE IT SO ORGANIC, YOU MIGHT

ON A COMPLETELY UNRELATED NOTE,
I AM FEELING A LITTLE THIRSTY

YOU KNOW WHAT WOULD REALLY HIT
THE SPOT?

WITH SIX DOORS AND A MASSIVE
TRUNK, THE CLUBMAN IS THE

IN ITS SURPRISINGLY SPACIOUS
INTERIOR WE CAN FIT:

CIVIL WAR RE-ENACTORS FROM
OPPOSING SIDES.

THAT IS TWO CONFEDERATE SOLDIERS
IN THE FRONT, BECAUSE THEY

STARTED IT, AND THREE UNION
SOLDIERS IN THE BACK.

THEY'RE FIVE BROTHERS FROM THE
SAME FAMILY, WHICH IS EXTRA

BUT THERE IS A HAPPY ENDING,
BECAUSE THERE IS SO MUCH ROOM IN

THE CLUBMAN, THEY DO NOT NEED TO
FIGHT.

BECAUSE AS LINCOLN NEVER SAID,
"A MINI CLUBMAN DIVIDED AGAINST

ITSELF CANNOT STAND, BUT THEY DO
NOT HAVE TO STAND WITH ALL THAT

WAR IS HELL, BUT THIS CAR IS
HEAVEN.

(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE)
BUT THERE ARE JUST SO MANY

STORIES OUT THERE, I CAN'T

LUCKILY, I DON'T HAVE TO DECIDE

SO THIS GUY HOLDING THE POLE

ITHE BERNIE SANDERS THING THE

PLATES.

WE BASED THE DOME ON, THIS
SPINNING WHEEL.
